description:
When nursing home abuse or neglect takes place, our staff at Olsman Mackenzie Peacock & Wallace PC acts quickly. From our law office in Lapeer, Michigan, we offer free initial consultations to victims and their loved ones. Our team listens patiently as clients share their stories. We then immediately get to work on developing a strategy to hold negligent facilities and their staff responsible.

Our law office was founded on the principle of steadfast advocacy for those who suffer a personal injury such as nursing home neglect. We take a client-centered approach to every case, ensuring that those we represent feel confident about how the case is progressing. Using creative tactics and attention to detail, we have successfully helped a number of people across Michigan obtain the compensation necessary to begin recovery.

In addition to representing victims, we also work to ensure that people can recognize the symptoms of abuse. The team at our law office knows how physically and emotionally devastating it can be for patients to suffer at the hands of those who should be caring for them. Our experienced attorneys at Olsman Mackenzie Peacock & Wallace PC will work tirelessly to protect the rights of those at risk of or who have been abused. As a matter of convenience, we accept credit cards, and we have additional offices in Berkley and Battle Creek.
